derivation: probably from the same as the former part of G1438 (ἵνα) (through the demonstrative idea;
kjv_def: albeit, because, to the intent (that), lest, so as, (so) that, (for) to
strongs_def: compare G3588 (ἵνα)); in order that (denoting the purpose or the result)
outline: 1. that, in order that, so that
